subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees are in discussions with the Braves and the Pirates about a three-way deal that would send outfielder Melky Cabrera to the Braves and bring reliever Mike Gonzalez to the Bronx, according to a baseball official.
snippet: The Yankees are in discussions with the Braves and the Pirates about a three-way deal that would send outfielder Melky Cabrera to the Braves and bring reliever Mike Gonzalez to the Bronx, according to a baseball official.
